title: informal Cyrillic script from native hand
content:
hi Typophiles,  
i've just released AndrijScript Cyrillic.  
it bases on my own handwriting, fascinated by historical Ukrainian _'skoropys'_ quick-writing and spiced by few chimeric shapes and unusual Cyrillic ligatures.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140418080526im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ascript_01_6166.png)

welcome see few pictures on [http://type.org.ua/andrijscript-cyrillic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140418080526/http:/type.org.ua/andrijscript-cyrillic/ "http://type.org.ua/andrijscript-cyrillic/")  
or test-drive on [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/andrijscript-cyrillic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140418080526/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/andrijscript-cyrillic/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/andrijtype/andrijscript-cyrillic/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140418080526im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ascript_25off_5784.png)

thanks!
author: andrijtype
